title: Sheet Pan Flatbreads
ingredients: desired toppings (italian sausage, pepperoni, onion, bell pepper, etc.
directions: Adjust rack to top position and preheat oven to 450 degrees.
Prepare and cook selected toppings as needed.
In microwave safe bowl, combine 1 tsp italian seasoning, 1/4 cup water, 2 tbsp butter, and 1/2 tsp sugar.
Microwave until water is hot and butter has melted, 1 minute.
Whisk in tomato paste until smooth, season with salt and pepper.
Spread half the sauce over the flagbreads.
Optionally toss meat toppings in remaining sauce.
Top flatbreads with mozzerella and toppings.
Bake on top rack until flatbreads are toasted, cheese has melted and toppings are good 8-10 minutes.
